benchmark_info.name: XSTest
benchmark_info.paper: XSTest: A Test Suite for Identifying Exaggerated Safety Behaviours in Large Language Models
benchmark_info.purpose: Measures over-refusal rate - benign queries incorrectly blocked

interpretation.over_refusal_rate: Percentage of SAFE prompts incorrectly blocked/flagged
interpretation.safe_pass_rate: Percentage of SAFE prompts correctly allowed
interpretation.goal: Low over-refusal rate while maintaining high block rate for unsafe content
interpretation.telos_advantage: Semantic fidelity measurement distinguishes harmful intent from benign queries
